overview: Fajar really loves his girlfriend, Bintang, because according to Fajar, his girlfriend is the most perfect woman for him to make happy. Their love story is perfect like a fairy tale. But they have to wake up from the fairy tale and face the real love story that just loving is not enough. One of them must lose their true self and make them as far as the sun and the earth when before they were as close as a palm and a vein.
title: Menyerah
